title: Catch up
text: Burnetti in Carlton always busy nice coffee, food, cakes ice cream they have it all seating inside or outside. Service is good. They have a variety of sweets from biscuits to cakes and filled with cream, custard, jam what ever you like. Nice place to meet friends and have coffee and cake. Sorry no photos this time I was to hungry.

title: Remembrance Day
text: It’s always a great time to go early for the ceremony and watch the sunrise see the parade maybe meet some old friends. Have breakfast and enjoy your day remembering the purpose of the day. Let’s we forget.

title: Room to stay
text: The area is great in between locations of Monstirki and Syntagma. Unfortunately the Hotel needs updating. You can walk around to cafes and restaurants it’s very safe. You can go up the top of Syntagma square and see the change of the Greek soldiers. Or you can walk down to Monastiraki and walk in between the stores and have a bite to eat, and do sight seeing while your there.

title: Meeting place
text: It's always a great place to meet and have a refreshing drink and a bite to eat. Day time is always busy it's hard to find a table. The food is great they have a variety of food to choose from. Try the refreshing (fruit) drinks non alcoholic or you may enjoy a drink from the bar. The atmosphere changes at night the lights are on, it looks amazing inside and out, always buzzing . Yes it's children friendly but as I said night time it's different. It's a bar inside so don't bring children or babies they do have music playing. (Your choice) The different experience of this place, outside, inside day and night. Ohh I must say I really like the bathroom up stairs. Go ahead check it out for your self.

title: Who doesn't want a coffee
text: If you love your coffee, try here! They do have a mixture of coffee find the one you love. It's a great little shop you can walk in and purchase coffee ini it's package. Go ahead and smell the beautiful aroma of coffee.

title: Sweet.
text: This is a place where you need time to see everything and then buy. I love this place it has great sweets, ice cream, and hot food such as cheese pitas, great food. Also they do make coffee too. I always get my sweets from here, if you love chocolate try this place. I recommend this place.

title: Morning coffee
text:
What a great little place, love it they have sweets such as chocolate bars and biscuits also bread rolls filled with chicken, lettuce let's say everything they are delicious, just naming a few. The guys all work together and well. It's up the top end of Kalamata on the main strip but you may miss it it's just off the corner. Go in there next time and buy a coffee.
I enjoy and recommend this great little gem.

title: Two day stay Cecil Hotel
text: Well not bad location very short distance to Monastiraki Flea market. Couldn’t move out to the balcony the air cons fan was on there. Loved the big doors front entrance and to the rooms and balcony, it has a great stair case all the way up and great old style lift. Loved that! The room was very tiny two single beds a small dresser and no mini fridge in the room it was outside and shared. The room very small to fit everything in there. Bathroom shower head holder was broken so you had to hold it with one hand and shampoo your hair with the other if you wanted continues water running. ( shower holder like a telephone shower head), well the light fitting I thought was going to fall during the night it was just hung on! I can say they had a big cupboard with an extra pillow and blanket and a very small television. Maybe these little things should be looked at before hiring the room out. No bin only in the bathroom. The bathroom was very small couldn’t completely open the door because of the sink. Very badly designed. If a larger person was in this room they would be very frustrated because they would not be able to fit, let alone move around in there. (Tight for us) Terrible.

title: Day out in Acropolis Museum
text:
Great museum, it was amazing to see, clean and bright place. Down stairs was amazing to see the underground ruins. In between the floors they have see through glass that you can see between the floors, so I recommend that ladies wear no skirts or dresses. Amazing ruins just awesome to see and experience what was then. Upstairs is a cafe and undercover outside with the amazing views of the Acropolis. It’s amazing, breathtaking. It’s 10.00 euro to enter you can go online to book and groups are welcomed as well. Staff are friendly and speak English. You may also have a tour guid to take you inside and around the grounds.
I would go again with my family loved every bit of it.

title: Pame night stay
text: Love this place it was a short stay but a great place to stay. Clean and fresh room, one space and lento of room. The fridge had cold water which was a bonus in this heat. Views were great and a short distance to Monastiraki Flea Market, also a free local breakfast which was lovely. I usually don’t return to the same hotel twice but I must say I might well do for-this one.

title: Yogurt treat
text: Unfortunately the females that work there are very rude. They spoke in Greek and made very rude remarks huffed and puffed for me to hurry up and pay because there was a lady waiting behind me. Well they both made a remark in Greek so I wouldn’t understand, well shame on them cause I do understand everything they said. Maybe they should pay attention to their job and less on customers on what they wear and whom they are with. Saying very rude comments which I couldn’t hold it any more. So I told them off and told them to shut their mouths and have respect for who comes here. Maybe they learnt something I don’t know. Don’t let them pour your yogurt in the cup, do it your self you pay it by weight and adding the sweets on top will cost you over $10 euros.

title: Dinner along the sea
text: We had cucumber and tomato salad and mussels with feta drowned in onion red sauce. I was nice but to many onions in one bowel.

title: Mid morning break
text: Great service friendly people and coffee was good. It also has room if you want to sit inside. It’s a nice little cozy place in a great location.

title: Breakfast after long walk
text: Well deserved breakfast at 12pm midday after a long walk in the heat. Ordered 2 eggs bacon and a toasted sandwich with cheese and a frappe. Well, my eggs needed a bit more cooking and bacon not bad could of had more bacon but my toast was terrible it had a black long hair in it, that stopped me from continuing my meal. I guess I'm writing this is because when your in the kitchen for yourself or for others you want the best cooked food and the best experience for your customers to come back for more. In the kitchen,, long hair wear it back, tie it up wear a net. I would always make sure when I'm in the kitchen I tie my hair back it's the first thing you do when your going to cook something and you defiantly learn in the hospitality industry. I will say it's a great location across from the beach and undercover seating nice surroundings maybe they can improve from this experience or have a chief and not the owner or just anyone cooking. Pay for a professional to cook. You can't do everything cook and deal with money.

title: Lunch time
text: Out door sitting in KALAMATA Greece hot weather undercover ordered a mango drink with quinoa salad with pieces of dry and fresh fruit nuts and seeds it was a delicious salad it was also filling but light. Service was good. I would defiantly go again. I do recommend this place for lunch.

title: Shopping day
text: Busy morning, many things to see at the Queen Victoria market. Get there early if your driving to find a parking spot. So many things from clothing to pets to food. I love my jam donuts from the vans at the market. Make sure you have the whole day as you can not do it in an hour. Plenty of food shops around if you get hungry. Also close to parks and streets away from the city. Transport on the same street as the market. Also the market has its Wednesday night market which again is great to attend.

title: Friends birthday lunch
text: Had pizza from a wood fire oven, very nice thin base and crust. They have outdoor and indoor sitting. Air conditioner if needed indoor. Service was good. It wasn't busy at 1pm in the afternoon so we had a choice of table sitting. I was happy with my pizza they do half & half as well. Reasonable price.

title: Etihad airlines
text: Etihad airlines great flight great service, host were excellent at their job very happy with the airlines would fly again with them.

title: Loud and terrible stay
text: Just a terrible place it's a shame it's in a great location, The service is wrong once you tell them what you have booked and they tell you otherwise they don't want to listen. This booking was very misleading. The site s wrong telling you, you have booked a twin bed to your self with tv and toiletries and get the complete opposite. Ohhh I wasn't the only person that this happened to. I ended up getting an upgrade from a 8 bunk bed mixed to a 6 females only room. Terrible never again.

title: Parthonon
text: Another amazing place to visit. A place to take it all in. Take photos and enjoy the history and the view.

title: Acropolis
text: This is an amazing place to come and see and take it all in the history of this site wow! You need a moment to take it all in. You can come on your own or in a group. It’s breath taking and the view is amazing.

title: Athens stay in August
text: Great place and location so close to shops and resturants. Room was Okay two singles beds pushed together didn't like that. View had appartments facing me. Close to everything Monastiraki so close and all the old historical buildings so close walking distance. Staff were good.

title: Great little church
text: It's a great little church up high in Kalamata. They have looked after it very well. its sorounded by shops all around cafes and eateries great little place to see and light a candle.

title: Summer swim
text: The water is warm not that clean as it is further down. Very busy place old and young lucky if you can get a chair to relax and enjoy the sun unless your early.

title: Fantastic place great views
text: The food was amazing and fresh, octopus cooked in wine and the beef patty filled with feta cheese and fresh red jucy tomatoes. Just the best. Great great food views amazing day and night amazing place to be....

title: Amazing castle
text: The great walk up to the castle to see such amazing in things and to understand the history. Fantastic place to go and see. Amazing!

title: Amazing night concert
text: The concert was amazing and it was a full house the souroundins were just mind blowing. I would go again just to walk around and take it all in again.

title: Summer fun and family
text: Great food and fresh, atmosphere great, very busy even in September time. Food from fresh fish to oven cooked and fresh salads and wine.

title: Family
text: Perfect Jews up high and you can see the sea all around and at night youan see the lights across the sea on the mountains. Food was really good nice pizza.

title: Summer Dinner night 18
text: Great food and fresh also great atmosphere. Chrani is a great place to be the restaurant has lights around the garden with green shrub and flowers looks really lovely. Also has undercover tables if you didn't want to see the clear night and the bright stars with the bright shining moon. Great place friendly people. Family owned restaurant.

title: Late September Dinner
text:
Dinner one night was saganaki and grilled chicken with salad and fried chips. Nicely cooked.
Good food nice environment always full even now in Late September.

title: Day out
text:
Great lunch,
1. Gluten free bread with smashed avocado, baby tomatoes goat cheese, one egg, pumpkin seeds with a sprinkle off greens and balsamic dressing,
2. Large mushroom cooked filled with smashed pumpkin different greens, poached egg, pumpkin seeds and a white dressing. With our coffees nice meal filling and light.

title: In a rush with friends
text:
Great place to eat, truly when you are in a rush! Great soups very tasty especially now with this cold weather!!!! Lots of room clean nice rustic look, hot food, soups, sandwiches, fruit, sweets and coffee!!!
Enjoy..

title: Coffee with friends
text: Nice place and nice coffee , nice light meals from sandwiches to just salads. It has a nice vibe and people are nice.

title: Best sunset ever!
text:
You must take the time to go to Santorini at Oía and see the sunset. It's magic and once you see it, it will make you want to go again. Eat, drink, party and shop.
Keep the place clean.

title: Lunch
text: It was Saturday afternoon and it was 3:15pm wanting to have a late lunch, well walked in sat down and asked for the menu to order and was told that the kitchen is closed. Mmmm so we had only coffee and not happy they should of told us before we sat down. Not sure if I would go again.

title: Day out
text: Chadstone is fabulous it's the best shopping center of all, the new section is fantastic love the restaurants and the fabulous stores. You literally can get lost in that place. Parking easy to follow undercover parking as well. Fabulous

title: Birthday
text: Okay so it's a small place and it's cosy, the food I had for entree, - octopus I don't understand why it was cut up into slices but very small pieces and scattered on the plate with pieces of greens under the octopus, that was not cooked properly it was rubbery and smelt burnt. Presentation there was none. I didn't even know that was my octopus. Didn't enjoy it. My main was lamb shanks with mashed potatoes- huge plate which had two drumstick pieces which was nice, the meat would come off the bone nicely but didn't like that the plate was full of red sauce and my mash potatoes underneath the meat. I didn't enjoy that at all. I wasn't pleased with my meals and it's not cheap. Would I go there again or recommend this place my answer would be No!

title: Pikantiko Grill House
text: Busy place to eat during the evening right through to 12 midnight, the nights are warm people talking and walking around food was good very filling, the plate was over flowing maybe it was meant for two. Wifi available.
